data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Korovchinsky, Nikolai M., Sergeeva, Nelli G. (2008): A new family of the order Ctenopoda (Crustacea: Cladocera) from the depths of the Black Sea. Zootaxa 1795: 57-66, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.182646
